testcase.classname: Memberships E2E Tests Invite User to Organization
testcase.name: Admin should invite user to organization successfully

testcase.classname: Memberships E2E Tests Invite User to Organization
testcase.name: Should fail to invite same user twice

testcase.classname: Memberships E2E Tests Invite User to Organization
testcase.name: Regular user should fail to invite without admin permissions

testcase.classname: Memberships E2E Tests Invite User to Organization
testcase.name: Should invite user with different roles

testcase.classname: Memberships E2E Tests Get Memberships
testcase.name: Admin should get memberships by organization

testcase.classname: Memberships E2E Tests Get Memberships
testcase.name: Admin should get memberships by user

testcase.classname: Memberships E2E Tests Get Memberships
testcase.name: User should get their own memberships

testcase.classname: Memberships E2E Tests Get Memberships
testcase.name: Should fail without userId or organizationId

testcase.classname: Memberships E2E Tests Get Memberships
testcase.name: Regular user should fail to get other user memberships

testcase.classname: Memberships E2E Tests Get Membership by ID
testcase.name: Admin should get membership by ID

testcase.classname: Memberships E2E Tests Get Membership by ID
testcase.name: Should fail with invalid membership ID

testcase.classname: Memberships E2E Tests Update Member Role
testcase.name: Admin should update member role successfully

testcase.classname: Memberships E2E Tests Update Member Role
testcase.name: Should fail with invalid role

testcase.classname: Memberships E2E Tests Update Member Role
testcase.name: Regular user should fail to update role without permissions

testcase.classname: Memberships E2E Tests Remove Member
testcase.name: Admin should remove member successfully

testcase.classname: Memberships E2E Tests Remove Member
testcase.name: Regular user should fail to remove member without permissions

testcase.classname: Memberships E2E Tests Self-Leave Organization
testcase.name: User should be able to leave organization (remove own membership)

testcase.classname: Memberships E2E Tests Cross-Organization Access Validation
testcase.name: Organization admin should not access memberships from other organizations

testcase.classname: Memberships E2E Tests Cross-Organization Access Validation
testcase.name: Organization admin should not invite users to other organizations

testcase.classname: Memberships E2E Tests Cross-Organization Access Validation
testcase.name: Super admin should access all organizations
